metadata.title: CVE-2018-1054 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
An out-of-bounds memory read flaw was found in the way 389-ds-base handled certain LDAP search filters, affecting all versions including 1.4.x. A remote, unauthenticated attacker could potentially use this flaw to make ns-slapd crash via a specially crafted LDAP request, thus resulting in denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-1054` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

389-ds - 1.4.1.5-1
389-ds-base - 1.4.1.5-1
389-ds-base-libs - 1.4.1.5-1
cockpit-389-ds - 1.4.1.5-1
python3-lib389 - 1.4.1.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.4.1.5-1').
